p: Concerning to in vivo experiments, no hypoglycemic effect was observed on STZ-induced diabetic mice after oral administration of alantolactone. However, inflammation and renal abnormalities were suppressed via inhibition of NF-κB gene expression and the high glucose-induced overexpression of pro-inflammatory cytokines and macrophage adhesion in renal NRK-52E cells were inhibited. ( Zhu et al., 2020). These results led the authors to propose a beneficial use for the treatment of diabetic neuropathy. Taking together all evidences mentioned for alantolactone ( 6) activity, it is probably that this compound could reduce some components of MetS by the regulation of inflammatory processes.
